Herosection.Heading: We Pride Ourselves On Service & Results

About.HighlyQualified: Highly Qualified & Experienced in Personal Injury Law
About.Expertise: We have expertise in many aspects of personal injury law. We fight to ensure our clients and their families receive the compensation, care and support they deserve. We proudly act as your advocate and trusted advisor through the complex legal, medical and insurance issues related to your recovery.
About.CaseReq: Please tell us about your case

ImportantSteps.imp: Important Steps to Take When in a
ImportantSteps.CallThePolice: Call The Police - It’s important to file a police report. This helps build the foundation of your case.
ImportantSteps.TakePhotographs: Take Photographs Of The Scene - This enables the attorneys to effectively negotiate your case.
ImportantSteps.PayAttention: Pay Attention - Listen for details from the at-fault party. Any admittance or what they believe caused the accident. Their answers can be used in court.
ImportantSteps.SeekMedical: Seek Medical Attention - Work with law enforcement and medical professionals on the scene. Medical care will aid your recovery and create an official record of your injury - providing evidence for your case.
ImportantSteps.BePatient: Be Patient - Your health is what’s most important. If you decide to let us fight your case, we’ll worry about the legalities while you focus on your recovery treatment plan.

PracticeArea.RepresentClients: We represent clients who have suffered injuries in automobile accidents.
PracticeArea.Specialize: We specialize in representing clients in Atlanta who have suffered injuries due to bicycle accidents.
PracticeArea.Motorcycle: Motorcycle accidents may result in serious injuries. Our motorcycle injury lawyers are ready to help.
PracticeArea.WilsonPC: At The Wilson PC, we work tirelessly to ensure that our clients receive the compensation they deserve for the damages they have suffered.
PracticeArea.Dedicated: We are dedicated to representing clients who have experienced injuries in accidents involving trucks.
PracticeArea.SkilledAtlanta: A skilled Atlanta wrongful death attorney can improve your chances to win a civil suit and get the compensation you need to support your family.

CallToAction.BigInsurance: We’ve taken on big insurance companies and large corporations nationwide to recover billions for clients hurt in accidents just like you!

Testimonials.Hear: Hear what our past clients say
Testimonials.Strive: We strive to provide all of our clients with the best possible results and value how each feels about us and the services we have provided. We are honored by the reviews we have received from both past and present clients
Testimonials.IncrediblySweet: They were incredibly sweet, knowledgeable, and very very helpful! I appreciate you all for everything you’ve done for me! If I ever need an accident lawyer in the future or if anyone I know needs one, you all will be my attorney again! No doubt about it! Thank you so so much for you guys help and I’m so happy with the outcome.
Testimonials.GreatExperience: I had a great experience working with this law firm from start to finish. The team always communicated updates, answered my questions, helped with special accommodations and fought for my case. Very polite, transparent and compassionate team.
Testimonials.handled: They handled my case with the utmost professionalism and care, ensuring I was well-informed and supported throughout the entire process. Their expertise and dedication resulted in a favorable outcome, and I am truly grateful for their hard work and commitment to my case.
Testimonials.Responsive: Their team was incredibly knowledgeable, responsive, and genuinely cared about my case. They provided clear guidance and support throughout the entire process, ensuring I understood my options and felt confident in the decisions we made.

SliderBanner.Improper: An improper lane change by a semi-truck led to a multi-vehicle crash that left our client suffering severe spinal injuries. The at-fault driver’s insurance initially offered $78,000. After multiple exchanges with the opposing counsel, our attorneys reached a final settlement of $400,000 5 times the amount of the original offer
SliderBanner.RearEnded: Our client was rear-ended on her way home for work. The defendant tried to minimize our client’s injuries and damages, but the firm’s personal injury litigation team reached a $400,000 settlement.
SliderBanner.HeadOn: Our client was struck  by a defendant traveling on the opposite side of the road at highway speeds. The firm’s personal injury pre-suit practice settled this motor vehicle case for $1,050,000.
SliderBanner.Slowing: Our client was slowing down for traffic ahead when a semitruck plowed through both the vehicle behind him and into his vehicle destroying the rear half of his car. The firm settled a semi-truck accident for $600,000.
